subject: Olympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: If ever logic prevailed in track and field, let alone the rest of the world, Khadevis Robinson would have made this year’s Olympic team in the men’s 800 meters.
snippet: If ever logic prevailed in track and field, let alone the rest of the world, Khadevis Robinson would have made this year’s Olympic team in the men’s 800 meters.
